Introduction

Jeong Yu Jin, formerly known as Mail, is a South Korean singer. She is a former member of the girl group The Ark. She made her solo debut on May 13, 2019 with the digital single "DM" under the stage name Mail.

Fun facts

1
Jeong Yu Jin performed "I Will Go To You Like The First Snow" (Guardian / Goblin OST by Ailee) with Park Joohee during episode 4 of the Mnet/tvN survival show "The Voice of Korea 2020" on June 19, 2020.
…
2
Jeong Yu Jin performed "Flashlight" (Pitch Perfect 2 OST by Jessie J) with The Ark member Jeon Minju, and "The Day After" during episode 12 of the MBN variety show "Miss Back" on December 29, 2020.
…
3
Jeong Yu Jin (as SingAgain3 Singer No.44) performed "You Are Still My Love" (by Lee Eun-ha) with Ocyan during episode 4 of the JTBC survival show "Sing Again 3" on November 16, 2023.
…
4
Jeong Yu Jin (as SingAgain3 Singer No.44) performed "My Sea" (by IU) during episode 2 of the JTBC survival show "Sing Again 3" on November 2, 2023.
…
5
Jeong Yu Jin performed "Living in the Same Time" (by Naul of Brown Eyed Soul) during the episode 7 semi-final of the Mnet/tvN survival show "The Voice of Korea 2020" on July 10, 2020.
…
6
Jeong Yu Jin performed "Love, ing" (by Ben) and joined coach Kim Jong Kook's team during episode 1 of the Mnet/tvN survival show "The Voice of Korea 2020" on May 29, 2020.
…
